required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Candesartan Effectiveness Study in Pro-B Type Natriuretic Peptides (BNP)
clinical_study.official_title: A Multicenter, Non-comparative, Phase IV Study to Evaluate the Effect of Candesartan Based Therapy in the Percent Change of proBNP Level After 24 Week Treatment in the Patients With Hypertension With Left Ventricular Hypertrophy

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to investigate effect of candesartan based therapy on percent change of B type natriuretic peptides(BNP) level in the subjects with hypertension and left ventricular hypertrophy.

primary_outcome.measure: Percent Change of B Type Natriuretic Peptides (BNP) Level
primary_outcome.description: Change of B Type Natriuretic Peptides Level of the Subjects With Hypertension and Left Ventricular Hypertrophy (LVH) Treated With Candesartan Based Therapy for 24 Weeks was calculated just as the later time point minus the earlier time point. No specific calculation was used.

secondary_outcome.measure: LVH(Left Ventricular Hypertrophy) Regression by Echocardiac Parameter, Left Ventricular Mass Index
secondary_outcome.description: Change of Left Ventricular Hypertrophy(LVH) by Echocardiac Parameter, Left Ventricular mass Index (LVMI) was calculated and collected through the way of Last Observational carried forward. LVH/Index was calculated like this: Divide LV mass with Body Surface Area.
Change of Systolic Blood Pressure was calculated and collected through the way of Last Observational carried forward.

Change of Diastolic Blood Pressure was calculated and collected through the way of Last Observational carried forward. Only who has diastolic blood pressure data both baseline and follow up was analyzed. Most of patient who enrolled, 302 have a data.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percent Change of proBNP(B Type Natriuretic Peptides) in Patients Treated With Candesartan Only
secondary_outcome.description: Percent change of proBNP(B type Natriuretic Peptides) was calculated and collected through the way of Last Observational carried forward.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percent Change of proBNP(B Type Natriuretic Peptides) in Patients With Candesartan Plus Felodipine
secondary_outcome.description: Percent change of proBNP(B type Natriuretic Peptides) was calculated and collected through the way of Last Observational carried forward.

arm_group.description: Subjects were treated for 24 weeks with Candesartan 16mg once daily as initial dose. Subjects were modified investigational product dose to Candesartan 32mg, Candesartan 32mg + Felodipine 5mg, Candesartan 32mg + Felodipine 10mg, sequentially according to their blood pressures.

intervention.description: 16 mg once daily in oral tablet form
32 mg once daily in oral tablet form
5 mg once daily in oral tablet form
10 mg once daily in oral tablet form

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Hypertension with diastolic blood pressure within 95-115 mm/Hg or/and systolic blood pressure within 160-200 mm/Hg
- Patients diagnosed as left ventricular hypertrophy by electrocardiogram
Exclusion Criteria:
- Secondary hypertension
- History of myocardial infarction
- Stroke within the previous 6 months

participant_flow.recruitment_details: Milestone date: 15 June 2006 (FSI) ~ 05 June 2008 (LSLV) Type of location: General Hospital; 333 subjects enrolled, but 18 subjects failed to be randomized, 315 subjects were randomized to study.
participant_flow.pre_assignment_details: Screening period: Laboratory test (Creatinine, potassium, ALT, etc)

group.title: Candesartan
group.description: Subjects were treated for 24 weeks with Candesartan 16mg once daily as initial dose. Subjects were modified investigational product dose to Candesartan 32mg, Candesartan 32mg + Felodipine 5mg, Candesartan 32mg + Felodipine 10mg, sequentially according to their blood pressures.

outcome.description: Change of B Type Natriuretic Peptides Level of the Subjects With Hypertension and Left Ventricular Hypertrophy (LVH) Treated With Candesartan Based Therapy for 24 Weeks was calculated just as the later time point minus the earlier time point. No specific calculation was used.

measure.title: Percent Change of B Type Natriuretic Peptides (BNP) Level
measure.description: Change of B Type Natriuretic Peptides Level of the Subjects With Hypertension and Left Ventricular Hypertrophy (LVH) Treated With Candesartan Based Therapy for 24 Weeks was calculated just as the later time point minus the earlier time point. No specific calculation was used.

outcome.title: LVH(Left Ventricular Hypertrophy) Regression by Echocardiac Parameter, Left Ventricular Mass Index
outcome.description: Change of Left Ventricular Hypertrophy(LVH) by Echocardiac Parameter, Left Ventricular mass Index (LVMI) was calculated and collected through the way of Last Observational carried forward. LVH/Index was calculated like this: Divide LV mass with Body Surface Area.
outcome.population: Only 245 patients who have reliable Echocardiac data were analyzed.

measure.population: Only 245 patients who have reliable Echocardiac data were analyzed.

event.sub_title: Pneumonia with effusion in the right chest

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: The only disclosure restriction on the PI is that the sponsor can review results communications prior to public release and can embargo communications regarding trial results for a period that is less than or equal to 60 days. The sponsor cannot require changes to the communication and cannot extend the embargo.
